item.title: Installing Lineage OS to a Samsung Galaxy A3
item.description: Introduction Heimdal Build Heimdal git clone https://gitlab.com/BenjaminDobell/Heimdall.git sudo dnf install libusb-devel.x86_64 cd Heimdall mkdir build; cd build cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DDISABLE_FRONTEND .. make Check installation Put your device in download mode, on the A3 it’s: 1 Switch OFF device 2 Volume Down + Home button + Power button. 3 Choose Download mode: Volume Up $ sudo ./heimdal detect Download PIT file $ sudo ./heimdall download-pit --output 'a3-2020-02-20.pit' --verbose Heimdall v1.
